ARABIC: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We rained down a rain upon them. See the final fate of the evildoers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We rained down on them a shower (of Stones). So witness the end of sinners!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We let loose a shower [of stones] upon them, Observe, then, the end of the evil-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We sent a torrential rain unto the (unbelievers). Consider how disastrous the end of the criminals was!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We rained a shower (of stones) upon them; therefore see what sort of fate befell the culprits!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We rained down on them a rain (of stones). Then see what was the end of the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We rained upon them a rain; consider then what was the end of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We rained down upon them a rain; so behold thou, how was the end of the sinners!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We rained a rain upon them. See now the nature of the consequence of evil-doers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We rained down on them a shower [of brimstone]. Then see what was the end of the evil-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We rained upon them a rain. So behold! what like was the end of the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We poured down upon them a rain [of stones]. So observe how was the fate of the guilty!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And we rained down on them a shower (of brimstone): Then see what was the end of those who indulged in sin and crime!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We rained down on them a rain (of stones). Then see what was the end of the Mujrimun (criminals, polytheists, sinners, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We rained down upon them a rain. So look how was the end of the evildoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We rained down on them a rain; note the consequences for the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones]. Then see how was the end of the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:84] And We rained upon them a rain, the stones of baked clay (hijārat al-sijjīl), and it destroyed them. So behold what was the end of the sinners!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We rained a rain upon them) We sent down upon their travellers and homosexuals stones from heaven. (See now) Muhammad (the nature of the consequence for evil-doers!) the end result of the idolaters is destruction.
